  1. Mobile

ABOUT

Привет

Hello

Hola

I am Iuliia (i u l i i a), a New York-based UX UI designer from Ukraine 🇺🇦.

My UX UI journey began when I put my life in one suitcase and moved by myself to the United States when I was 20.

I had to design my new life from scratch and I was thrilled. This life-changing decision expanded my boundaries and exercised my grit and perseverance.

I am constantly finding ways to express my creative genius, whether learning and practicing new design trends, painting with watercolors or beating my husband in tennis and then losing to him in chess :)

If you have a project in mind, I am what you are looking for!
